name: Social Media Trifecta
author: Ayush Malakar

sections.description:
This a developer friendly plugin but can also be used via shortcodes [smt_facebook] [smt_twitter] [smt_instagram]
You the option for two templates:

  1. Default
  2. Developer

You can change the templates by setting the attribute template =’developer’ For instance if you want to change the template of facebook to developer all you would have to do is [smt_facebook template=”developer”]

You can also customize the template as well. Just drag the “Template” folder from the plugin into your theme and rename it to social-meida-trifecta. That should be about it
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Enter credentials as necessary
